name: Weishi Shi
content: Weishi Shi | University of North Texas Weishi Shi Computer Science and Engineering Assistant Professor Discovery Park F227 Office Hours:Mon 3:00 - 5:00 pm Weishi.Shi@unt.edu About Faculty Info | Research Profile | Google Scholar | Education PhD in Computer Science, Rochester Institute of Technology, 2022 MS in Information Science & Technology, Rochester Institute of Technology, 2016 BS in Software Engineering, Xi'an Jiao Tong University, 2009 Research My research interest lies in the general fields of machine learning and knowledge discovery, with a specific focus on active learning and its applications in diverse knowledge domains. My long-term research vision is to develop the next-generation machine learning paradigm, where the machine learns along with humans rather than blindly from humans. My research has been mainly published in machine learning and data mining venues, including NeurIPS, ICML, AISTATS, and ICDM.
